actions.in_committee: House Committee on Ways and Means
actions.text: Referred to Subcommittee on Social Security.

official_title: A bill to restrict payments to alien recipients of Social Security benefits and for other purposes.
subjects: Old age, survivors and disability insurance

summary.text: Prohibits payments under title II (Old Age, Survivors and Disability Insurance) of the Social Security Act unless the recipient is either: (1) a permanent U.S. resident who actually resides in the United States for at least six months in any one calendar year; or (2) a U.S. citizen at the time benefits become payable.

titles.title: A bill to restrict payments to alien recipients of Social Security benefits and for other purposes.
